statements: UPDATE customer_preferences SET travel_history = '{"countries_visited": ["USA", "Canada"]}', insurance_options = '{"basic": true}' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE customer_preferences SET insurance_options = '{"comprehensive": true}', travel_history = '{"countries_visited": ["France", "Germany", "Italy"]}' WHERE customer_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890';
